summary: This is a memorandum documenting a voluntary telephonic interview conducted by the DOJ Office of the Inspector General (OIG) with a former BOP Lieutenant from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York regarding the death of inmate Jeffrey Epstein. The interview was recorded and transcribed as part of an official OIG investigation.

persons.name: Daniel
persons.role: Special Agent, U.S. Department of Justice Office of the Inspector General
persons.context: Conducted the voluntary telephonic interview of the former BOP Lieutenant as part of the OIG investigation into Jeffrey Epstein's death.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the OIG investigation; was housed at MCC New York prior to his death.

persons.name: Ryan Geach
persons.role: Senior Special Agent, Assistant Special Agent in Charge
persons.context: Prepared and reviewed the memorandum documenting the interview.

connections.description: Special Agent Daniel was part of the OIG team investigating the circumstances surrounding Jeffrey Epstein's death.

events.title: OIG Interview of Former BOP Lieutenant
events.description: Senior Special Agent and Special Agent Daniel conducted a voluntary telephonic interview with a former BOP Lieutenant from MCC New York regarding the death of Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Death of Jeffrey Epstein
events.description: The official OIG investigation is centered on the death of BOP inmate Jeffrey Epstein while he was housed at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York, New York
keyFacts: The DOJ Office of the Inspector General (OIG) conducted an interview with a former BOP Lieutenant from MCC New York as part of its investigation into Jeffrey Epstein's death.
The interview was voluntary, conducted telephonically on June 16, 2021, and was recorded and transcribed.
At the time of the interview, the former lieutenant was employed by the U.S. Department of Homeland Security, Customs and Border Protection.
The document is an internal OIG memorandum and contains neither recommendations nor conclusions of the investigation.
